abstract: District of Columbia Judge Gerald Fisher orders retrial for Ingmar Guandique, man convicted of killing federal intern Chandra Levy in 2001; defense lawyers have argued that key witness lied in original case.
lead_paragraph: After his lawyers argued that a key witness had lied, Ingmar Guandique, who had been convicted of killing a federal intern in 2001, was granted a new trial by a District of Columbia judge.

headline.main: Man Convicted in Chandra Levy’s Killing Gets New Trial
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted in Intern’s Killing Gets New Trial

snippet: After his lawyers argued that a key witness had lied, Ingmar Guandique, who had been convicted of killing a federal intern in 2001, was granted a new trial by a District of Columbia judge.
